VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Golden Spoon relative to The Rusty Kettle?
SRP.A: The Golden Spoon is {below} The Rusty Kettle in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {The Golden Spoon}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sky High Cafe}.

VE.Q: What is The Golden Spoon's Customer Traffic in 1980?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's customer traffic in 1980 is {678.23} customers/day.

VE.Q: What is Emerald Diner's Customer Traffic in 1980?
VE.A: Emerald Diner's customer traffic in 1980 is {439.19} customers/day.

VE.Q: What is The Golden Spoon's Customer Traffic in 1979?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's customer traffic in 1979 is {602.16} customers/day.

VE.Q: What are the customer traffic of The Rusty Kettle, The Golden Spoon, and Emerald Diner in 1977?
VE.A: The Rusty Kettle's customer traffic is {492.92} customers/day, The Golden Spoon's customer traffic is {476.74} customers/day, Emerald Diner's customer traffic is {505.47} customers/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Customer Traffic in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum customer traffic is {370.16} customers/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Customer Traffic in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum customer traffic is {678.23} customers/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Customer Traffic level recorded for Emerald Diner?
EVJ.A: Emerald Diner reached approximately {505.47} customers/day in {1977}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Customer Traffic level recorded for Emerald Diner?
EVJ.A: Emerald Diner's lowest recorded level is approximately {439.19} customers/day in {1980}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Customer Traffic?
SC.A: The average total customer traffic is {2551.53} customers/day.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Customer Traffic go below 2523.89 customers/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Traffic in 1978 higher or lower than in 1980?
NC.A: The total customer traffic in 1978 was {lower} than in 1980.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1980, was the average total Customer Traffic higher or lower than between 1978 and 1979?
NC.A: The average total customer traffic between 1978 and 1980 was {higher} than between 1978 and 1979.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Traffic in 1979 higher or lower than in 1980?
NC.A: The total customer traffic in 1979 was {lower} than in 1980.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1979, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1978 and 1980?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between 1978 and 1979 was {smaller} than between 1978 and 1980.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {The Golden Spoon} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Sky High Cafe, Emerald Diner, The Rusty Kettle, Stellar Bistro, The Golden Spoon}.
